name: Build and Deploy to Google Cloud Run

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Authenticate to Google Cloud
        uses: google-github-actions/auth@v1
        with:
          credentials_json: ${{ secrets.GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY }}

      - name: Set up Google Cloud SDK
        uses: google-github-actions/setup-gcloud@v2
        with:
          project_id: ${{ secrets.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}
          version: 'latest'

      - name: Build Docker image
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v2
        with:
          version: latest

      - name: Authenticate Docker to Google Artifact Registry
        run: |
          echo "${{ secrets.GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY }}" > key.json
          gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=key.json
          gcloud auth configure-docker us-central1-docker.pkg.dev

      - name: Build and push Docker image
        run: |
          docker build -t us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/${{ secrets.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}/my-repo/my-image:${{ github.sha }} .
          docker push us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/${{ secrets.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}/my-repo/my-image:${{ github.sha }}

      - name: Deploy to Google Cloud Run
        run: |
          gcloud run deploy my-service \
            --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/${{ secrets.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}/my-repo/my-image:${{ github.sha }} \
            --platform managed \
            --region us-central1 \
            --allow-unauthenticated
